conbody.p:
You can use regular expressions in the following locations:
Directory - File Name Pattern property
All origins that process log data (Directory, Kafka Consumer, File Tail) and the Log Parser - Regular expression log format
File Tail origin - Files Matching Pattern archive method - regular expression to define the ${PATTERN}
Field Masker - Regular expression field mask type
String functions - replaceAll uses regex for the string to replace, regexCapture
